announcements.title: Scholarship Opportunity
announcements.description1: We're excited to announce a special scholarship opportunity for our community! Every Thursday from 11:30 PM to 12:30 PM, we will be hosting a weekly contest.
announcements.description2: The top five winners from each contest will earn the chance to join the U-CAN Academy E-Learning Platform for free.
announcements.description3: Mark your calendars and get ready to participate! Good luck!
